website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S10e has the best overall price, performance, and size for a flagship smartphone today.
pros: Just the right size for most hands
cons: Low-light camera performance not as good as the Google Pixel 3
Fingerprint sensor could be more accurate

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE OF THIS SELLER! The item being sold is not a genuine UK model, it is a modified EU variant! It is not a brand new device, items inside the box have been exchanged and the software replaced to match the UK variant! It is not the SM-G970FZWDBTU UK version as advertised, it is a SM-G970F modified EU model! This affects the warranty of the device! STAY CLEAR, DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous reviewer

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING ADVERTIMENT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FROM HERE if you want the headphones AGK N60. There is no way you will be eligible for the claim. Under the product's title, they report "By Samsung" but they are not (their name is JB INTL LTD), so you will not be eligible for the headphones. I think there is no reason why they mention in the advertisement in bold that you can claim the headphones. I hope this can help you.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: quite bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this phone but the battery life is not acceptable. It has been 2 weeks. Screen on time is ok at around 6 hours but standby time is horrible. In the evening I go home with 20 percent battery left at 5 pm with 2 hours screen on time! That is not a full day battery life claimed by Samsung. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KIVANC

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING PROMOTIONAL ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.text: You cannot claim the AGK N60 headphones from this purchase even though this section is highlighted in bold and it appears to be a purchase from Samsung. Avoid this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great job Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the phone the green is brilliant. 1 UI is really good I loved it on my S9 Samsung have gone above and beyond with this set of phones, I saw video reviews and the reviewers had cases and screen protectors come inside the box with the phone but mine hadn't.. little dissatisfied now I have to buy them separate but I'll live.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Made the switch from Apple and I couldn't be happier. Definitely prefer the S10e over the S10 and S10+
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone
customer_reviews.text: No regret jumping ship to Android from an old 5C (as i like phone with smaller screen unlike most) with this. Good camera, good memory size and feels solid
customer_reviews.author: Chee Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not model advertised
customer_reviews.text: I think the phone itself would be quite good. However, Amazon are being bad by not sending out the model stated on the page. I received the model originally intended for Asia rather than the specific UK model. Samsung have stated that this affects the warranty so I'm sending it straight back. Check the model number on the box before you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina McEwan

customer_reviews.title: do not buy from this seller, in fact just do not buy
customer_reviews.text: this is not uk version, it is clearly meant for italian market the charger does not work screen protector scratches and cracks the touch screen is not sensitive the seller, appliance direct is not interested in accepting responsibility, as seller, for the faults and will not give the usual 30 days to return the item on positive side, one of the few small smart phones left (if I wanted tablet - I'd buy one!!)
customer_reviews.author: twooks

customer_reviews.title: SyataDishmaya sent tampered item
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from seller: SyataDishmaya. Seal was broken. Phone not UK model as advertised. Accessories not original.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Not a UK model as stated
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself seems ok. Please be aware that although appliances direct state this is a UK model it isn't. It is a European model as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Colin D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Despite being advertised as a UK version, it was a European model, the box of which had been opened and changes made to the phone. Sorry, not acceptable and certainly not as advertised. Returned to Appliances Direct.
customer_reviews.author: Tesco Personal Finance Visa

customer_reviews.title: The Samsung S10e is simply the best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: After previous experience of Android phones I wasn't expecting much. I had to find a replacement for my Nokia Lumia 735 as Microsoft will not support it or the apps on it after 2019. The Samsung S10e exceeded all my expectations. It's even better at running Microsoft than the Lumia.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great small smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to have smartphone which is one hand friendly and powerful at the same time. Howerver, smartphones these days are only getting bigger and bigger... This phone is with a small size but have a powerful Snapdragon 855 chip also with fairly good cameras. Battery life is ok as if you use lightly during the day(use WhatsApp and Instagram etc) it could last the whole day. Buy if you like to play games you will need a power bank or maybe chose a bigger phone. If you are looking for a compact powerful phone with ok standard camera then this one is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: min xu

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and practical case!
customer_reviews.text: It looks really good and it's very practical. I don't know how long it will last or how genuine is the leather, but so far so good. I really like that you can talk on the phone with it closed and also the fact that you can close it and open it without interfering the work of the phone so that you can listen to music while it's closed and you don't see the screen at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So superior
customer_reviews.text: So superior to the M30s I owned for a couple of weeks. This does everything my computer does and more!
customer_reviews.author: Dabble

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Still prefer my s7 edge. But this is very close.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. A. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Does not honour 12 months warranty
customer_reviews.text: The phone is not a year old and it is not charging properly, I have tried to contact the seller but the seller has not come back in two weeks. Would not buy from the company again.
customer_reviews.author: Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone I have ever had. And you I think it's better than an iPhone
customer_reviews.author: still game

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent advertising, no valid warranty
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, you DO NOT receive the U.K. version but the European one. Samsung have confirmed that this means there is NO WARRANTY.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Cracking phone, replacement for my S6 and very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bazz H

customer_reviews.title: compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: As a Blackberry user I managed to set up the S10e with no issues. Find it easy to use (once I figured out how to answer a call!) dowloaded apps I wanted ie. Kindle and Whatsapp. Battery life good and charges quickly. Nice compact model for small hands to operate. Easily made keypad bigger and bolder to assist with typing. Haven't set up finger print scanner so not rated it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss H

customer_reviews.title: Top spec compact
customer_reviews.text: All round very good phone. Nice that's it's not massive.
customer_reviews.author: RianOC

customer_reviews.title: Top quality phone
customer_reviews.text: I will keep it short and sweet. The s10e is super quick the display is lush and the battery life is good 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great wee phone
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new phone, exactly what I wanted, newer technology but still not a big phone like all others.
customer_reviews.author: Owly13

customer_reviews.title: very happy of it
customer_reviews.text: fantastic phone, battery is great . Not too big . Display amazing. Very reliable
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse of a phone in small body, Shame about the battery
customer_reviews.text: Would be best phone ever if the battery wasn't so poor! Otherwise exceptional
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and price
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious reading some of the reviews; however, I've had no problems at all. This is a great phone and was fantastically priced. The box was sealed and was delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life a bit of a et down
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, battery life "ok" have to charge it very day! 🤨
customer_reviews.author: Ger

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: great phone not to big but powerful enough for me
customer_reviews.author: pelham

customer_reviews.title: Generally would be a great one.
customer_reviews.text: Finger print mostly not working. Touch screen sometimes does not accept actions.
customer_reviews.author: Zhana Stoeva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size but also very powerful. I think full size phones are too big - but this one is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone the mini S10. The delivery was so quick and easy., Took 1 day great seller.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality product, fits perfectly to the phone. Only thing is that, you need to press your finger hard in order to use finger touch.
customer_reviews.author: Gourvendra Singh

customer_reviews.title: Problem quickly solved
customer_reviews.text: There was an initial battery problem with this phone, but as it was quickly resolved by Fone-Central I've given five stars. Re the phone itself – neither better nor worse than any other.
customer_reviews.author: Gill Gairdner

customer_reviews.title: Android problems
customer_reviews.text: having trouble with the latest android not the phone, got to relearn how to use it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David Clegg

customer_reviews.title: Super phone at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived very quickly in brand new packaging. Lovely screen for watching videos, good camera, and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Initially locked, works fine now.
customer_reviews.text: Was initially locked into EE but the seller provided an unlock code.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mills

customer_reviews.title: It is a good size
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and how easy it was to transfer my information
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak stands
customer_reviews.text: The stands are very thin and weak. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Most features spot on but fingerprint reader a bit variable
customer_reviews.author: Ian Foster

customer_reviews.title: The item is in good condition as described TOP MARKS!!! Will definately use the Co again
customer_reviews.text: Value for money, delivered on time and without any issue Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Lyall

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Very nice smartphone, but the shipping was almost 3 days...
customer_reviews.author: Magi Miquel

customer_reviews.title: Fake item received.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed visible signs of damage on the box. The "seal" was in tact but the opposite side of the box had been cut and glued back together. Fake phone inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Worst Battery on a phone ever !!
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst phones I have ever purchased and I am shocked by the very bad performance of the battery, it’s shocking !! The performance of the device can best be described as average and the fingerprint scanner is at best hit and miss. Camera is of average I think I get better value on my Samsung Galaxy J5 which is half the cost of this. I bought this because I wanted to upgrade the memory and wish I had not bothered! It just shows that spending more you are not guaranteed better performance !
customer_reviews.author: COLIN HANNANT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone, but don't expect to claim your free reward from Samsung!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Samsung phone, I usually go with other mainstream brands. So far, 2 days in, I'm very pleased with my purchase. Only criticism I have you won't be able to claim your free reward (wireless headphones) from Samsung? 5 stars for the phone itself, but the Amazon page that this S10e is on is very misleading re the reward offer - wireless headphones! Hence 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J Leech

customer_reviews.title: Poor screen protection
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the phone function, but the screen marks very easy. (【Top Grade Protection】Samsung Galaxy S10e screen protector made from superior 9H tempered glass that is scratch resistant and shatterproof protecting your screen from scratches to high impact drops. ) I don't think this is the case as before I had a Nokia for 3 years and no marks. I did contact Samsung but very generic reply no satisfaction at all. Just given up and purchased NHFF for Samsung Galaxy 10e Screen Protector,[2 Pack] Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Samsung Galaxy 10e. which work but less finger sensitivity. Pleased with phone function, very poor screen protection and even worse customer help.
customer_reviews.author: Retep

customer_reviews.title: Switched from an iphone
customer_reviews.text: This was my first android phone, previously i had an iphone. I really like it, it does so much more than an iphone and the battery life doesn't even compare to apple. However the phone is still quite large to me as i a petite and have small hands so after a while my fingers start to ache. there are a few niggles with the phone and it isn't quite as seemless as an iphone but i like it and it has a headphone socket so that is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Milly.

customer_reviews.title: The 'e' really does mean essential and not economy
customer_reviews.text: Likes...I prefer the flat screen and the clarity is fine with good colours,especially in view of the price. The fingerprint scanner is excellent with instant readout. Very occasionally have to wipe my thumb tto make it work. Camera very good and sensible in keeping the wide angle lens and ditching the telephoto option. Not liked so much....Samsung sound has always been average and still is. But use headphones and all is well. Phone tends to open lock screen page when kept in my shirt breast pocket. That is annoying and haven't solved yet. But overall a nice value for money mobile.
customer_reviews.author: terry w cullen

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint Scanner Useless
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, ideal size, however, fingerprint scanner is useless. I've tried now 3 separate times to register fingerprints. Works a few times then not recognised/clean scanner error messages. Obviously building the scanner into the power button is not effective. Phone is being returned as it's proving too inconvenient/unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: pethead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent version of Samsung's Flagship phone
customer_reviews.text: They left all the best and, best of all, reduced the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kid

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Face recognition is great except when wearing a face mask or face shield. Fingerprint reader is often unsuccessful so I have to resort to a PIN. Touch creen is good but sensitivity is affected by a screen protector. Otherwise I'm really happy with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It works. Good battery life, fast charging. So far it runs everything I throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Good sized great phone
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good phone. The size is perfect, the screen is clear and big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lovasz Matyas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this phone. Replaces a Nokia 7.2 that kept freezing and crashing. It's just the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for a family member. They are really happy with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S10e 128 GB Hybrid-SIM Android Smartphone - White (UK Version)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Prism White| Size Name:128GB| Style Name:UK Version| Pattern Name:SingleThe Galaxy S10e features everything you expect from an S series, while fitting perfectly into your life. It packs all of our latest technology into a convenient and compact design that makes a difference to you. Its flat screen is endlessly beautiful, it lets you capture every moment and gives you the superpower to share your power. Please note, wireless charge compatible (QI standard) devices only. Battery charge above 30% required to PowerShare on the move without being plugged into mains charge.
feature_bullets: Smartphone innovation with an infinity-o display: the Galaxy S10e inspires with an endlessly beautiful screen. It stretches from side to side with no home button, no notch for the receiver and a simple dot opening for the front camera.

PowerShare: it gives you the superpower to to share your power wherever you are. Connect your Galaxy Watch or Galaxy Buds with the S10e and charge them at the same time, or bring your friend's back to life.
True Vision Camera: the Galaxy S10e captures every moment with a front camera, 2 rear cameras and an ultra-wide lens. Wi-Fi: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax 2.4G+5GHz, HE80, MIMO, 1024-QAM

Sim-free smartphone with side fingerprint scanner: have complete peace of mind at your fingertips and keep your Android phone and information secure. In one simple move, you can access everything in an instant.
Clear interface to make everything effortless: screens are uncluttered, icons pop with colour, the SmartThings app is already installed and we’ve even made it easier to use one-handed.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
